title: Uninstalling League to fix a problem only it's taking FOREVER.
body:
So recently I can't play LoL, whenever I try to open it, it flashes the logo for a second or two then disappears. No launcher appears or anything, just nothing. I tried searching for answers that might fix it but so far I have not been able to find a fix this problem, so I decided to try the uninstalling and reinstalling thing.

I can't say it's fixed because it's been a while. 13 seconds remaining has always been 13 seconds remaining 20 minutes ago. I just want to know what the heck is taking it so long, I only wanted to play some LoL. SMH.

replies.body: the same thing is happening to me and i have no idea how to fix it i tried deleting stuff in the rads folder and what not but i just cant get it going

> [{quoted}](name=PHD pancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fvyJmdeo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-24T05:14:36.024+0000)
>
> the same thing is happening to me and i have no idea how to fix it i tried deleting stuff in the rads folder and what not but i just cant get it going

Give the solutions in [**my comment**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/fvyJmdeo-uninstalling-league-to-fix-a-problem-only-its-taking-forever?comment=0002) a shot and let me know if you still have issues afterwards.
same aswell, this is really annoying, dont understand this since i can see other OCE players online through my iphone app{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=Arson,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fvyJmdeo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-24T05:28:38.537+0000)
>
> same aswell, this is really annoying, dont understand this since i can see other OCE players online through my iphone app{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Check out [**my comment**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/fvyJmdeo-uninstalling-league-to-fix-a-problem-only-its-taking-forever?comment=0002) and let me know if you're still having issues.

Heyo ItsSUPPERTIME,

If the logo flashes and the launcher doesn't appear afterwards, it indicates that it might either be a connection or a permissions issue. Please try adding an exception for League of Legends in any firewalls and antivirus applications you may have running and then trying the solutions in the [**Setting up your Permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Riot Games Support article. 

If that doesn't work, move on to the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article.
